H0.text: The Antarctica Treaty that is presently in force ends in which year. 2035

H1.text: The Antarctica Treaty that is presently in force ends in which year. 2050

H2.text: The Antarctica Treaty that is presently in force ends in which year. 2025

H3.text: The Antarctica Treaty that is presently in force ends in which year. 2041

A4.text: Starting from the year 2048, any of the consultative parties to the treaty may request the revision of the treaty and its entire normative system, with the approval of a three-quarters majority of consultative parties needed for the adoption of any changes.

A5.text: The Antarctic Treaty and related agreements, collectively known as the Antarctic Treaty System (ATS), regulate international relations with respect to Antarctica, Earth's only continent without a native human population.
